ticket.title: add nginx support for :x_sendfile option in file streaming
ticket.original-body:
Only Apache is supported right now. We should make it more web server agnostic.
Proposed:
* Turn the X_SENDFILE_HEADER constant into a method that can be set (keeping the const around for 2.x compatibility). * Add config option like: config.action_controller.streaming_header = :apache | :nginx | :lighttpd * Support SERVER_SOFTWARE env var for autodetection. Passenger [just added support](http://github.com/FooBarWidget/passenger/commit/81ca3ade903218e37617fb279c99f60bb478a638) for this.
@@@ ruby ENV['SERVER_SOFTWARE'] && ENV['SERVER_SOFTWARE'] =~ /nginx/ @@@
ticket.latest-body:
Only Apache is supported right now. We should make it more web server agnostic.
Proposed:
* Turn the X_SENDFILE_HEADER constant into a method that can be set (keeping the const around for 2.x compatibility). * Add config option like: config.action_controller.streaming_header = :apache | :nginx | :lighttpd * Support SERVER_SOFTWARE env var for autodetection. Passenger [just added support](http://github.com/FooBarWidget/passenger/commit/81ca3ade903218e37617fb279c99f60bb478a638) for this.
@@@ ruby ENV['SERVER_SOFTWARE'] && ENV['SERVER_SOFTWARE'] =~ /nginx/ @@@
ticket.original-body-html:
Only Apache is supported right now. We should make it more web server agnostic.

Proposed:

  • Turn the X_SENDFILE_HEADER constant into a method that can be set (keeping the const around for 2.x compatibility).
  • Add config option like: config.action_controller.streaming_header = :apache | :nginx | :lighttpd
  • Support SERVER_SOFTWARE env var for autodetection. Passenger just added support for this.

ENV['SERVER_SOFTWARE'] && ENV['SERVER_SOFTWARE'] =~ /nginx/

version.body:
Only Apache is supported right now. We should make it more web server agnostic.
Proposed:
* Turn the X_SENDFILE_HEADER constant into a method that can be set (keeping the const around for 2.x compatibility). * Add config option like: config.action_controller.streaming_header = :apache | :nginx | :lighttpd * Support SERVER_SOFTWARE env var for autodetection. Passenger [just added support](http://github.com/FooBarWidget/passenger/commit/81ca3ade903218e37617fb279c99f60bb478a638) for this.
@@@ ruby ENV['SERVER_SOFTWARE'] && ENV['SERVER_SOFTWARE'] =~ /nginx/ @@@
version.body-html:
Only Apache is supported right now. We should make it more web server agnostic.

Proposed:

  • Turn the X_SENDFILE_HEADER constant into a method that can be set (keeping the const around for 2.x compatibility).
  • Add config option like: config.action_controller.streaming_header = :apache | :nginx | :lighttpd
  • Support SERVER_SOFTWARE env var for autodetection. Passenger just added support for this.
ENV['SERVER_SOFTWARE'] && ENV['SERVER_SOFTWARE'] =~ /nginx/
version.title: add nginx support for :x_sendfile option in file streaming
add nginx support for :x_sendfile option in file streaming
add nginx support for :x_sendfile option in file streaming

version.body:
I think it is better not to "Add config option like: config.action_controller.streaming_header = :apache | :nginx | :lighttpd" but use "config.action_controller.streaming_engine = XAccelRedirect.new | XSendFile.new | PlainStream.new | ..." because XAccelRedirect takes relative url, while XSendFile uses filesystem path. Maybe some other nuances present.
I can code it if no one is working on it at the moment.
version.body-html:
I think it is better not to "Add config option like: config.action_controller.streaming_header = :apache | :nginx | :lighttpd" but use "config.action_controller.streaming_engine = XAccelRedirect.new | XSendFile.new | PlainStream.new | ..." because XAccelRedirect takes relative url, while XSendFile uses filesystem path. Maybe some other nuances present.

I can code it if no one is working on it at the moment.
version.title: add nginx support for :x_sendfile option in file streaming

version.body:
Vladmir, it doesn't seem anyone else is working on this at the moment. Can you work on a patch for this?
Thanks.
version.body-html:
Vladmir, it doesn't seem anyone else is working on this at the moment. Can you work on a patch for this?

Thanks.
version.title: add nginx support for :x_sendfile option in file streaming

version.body: This is a dup of other sendfile related issues. The correct solution is to use the fact that Rack can take a File, and people can use the SendFile middleware in Rack (or we can use it by default) to optimize that case.
version.body-html: This is a dup of other sendfile related issues. The correct solution is to use the fact that Rack can take a File, and people can use the SendFile middleware in Rack (or we can use it by default) to optimize that case.
version.title: add nginx support for :x_sendfile option in file streaming
add nginx support for :x_sendfile option in file streaming
